summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the licensing and regulation of public garages and parking lots; amending Sections 146, 147, 148, and 148-A of the License Code (Ordinance 48022) and adding thereto new sections designated Sections 148-B, 148-C, 148-D, 148-E, 148-F and 148-G to provide for posting of certain signs and notices at such public garages and parking lots.
